Hero.heading: Kidney, Urology, and Andrology Care You Can Trust
Hero.description: Evidence-based treatment with compassion. In-clinic consultations available.

Home.missionDescription: Delivering compassionate, evidence-based kidney, urology, and andrology care with a focus on long-term wellbeing.

About.careerObjectiveText: To establish and grow a patient-centered urology practice that offers advanced, evidence-based treatments with a focus on minimally invasive and robotic surgeries. My goal is to provide compassionate, high-quality care for a wide spectrum of urological conditions while building lasting trust within the community and contributing to improved health outcomes.
About.specializedTrainingItem1: Robotic surgery console surgeon certification (Intuitive Surgical)
About.specializedTrainingItem2: Renal transplant team member with extensive exposure
About.specializedTrainingItem3: Urethroplasty techniques including buccal mucosal grafts
About.researchItem1: Multiple paper presentations at national conferences (USICON, SOGUS)
About.researchItem2: Published research on renal transplantation techniques
About.researchItem3: Poster presentations on rare urological cases
About.researchItem4: Active participant in CMEs, conferences, and surgical workshops
About.missionText: Founded to provide comprehensive kidney, urology, and andrology services under one roof, we combine expertise with empathy to deliver the highest standard of care.
About.valueItem3: Advanced minimally invasive and robotic surgical techniques
About.valueItem4: Accessibility and convenience for all patients
About.valueItem5: Building lasting trust within the community

FAQs.q1: Do I need an appointment or can I walk in?
FAQs.a1: We recommend booking an appointment to reduce waiting time, but walk-ins are accepted based on availability.
FAQs.q2: How can I book an appointment?
FAQs.a2: You can call us, visit the clinic, or book online through our website or WhatsApp.
FAQs.a3: Our regular clinic hours are 6:00 PM – 9:00 PM, Monday to Saturday. Please call ahead to confirm timings on holidays or special occasions.
FAQs.a4: We specialize in kidney care, urology, and andrology — including treatment for kidney stones, urinary issues, male infertility, and sexual health concerns.
FAQs.q5: Are lab tests available at the clinic?
FAQs.a5: Yes, basic laboratory tests are available on-site. For advanced diagnostics, we partner with trusted labs.
FAQs.q6: How do I prepare for a kidney or andrology test?
FAQs.a6: Our staff will guide you depending on the test. Some tests may require fasting or full bladder preparation.
FAQs.q7: Do you provide treatment for male infertility?
FAQs.a7: Yes, we offer comprehensive evaluation and treatment options for male infertility and related conditions.
FAQs.q8: What payment methods do you accept?
FAQs.a8: We accept cash, UPI for all consultations and procedures.
